player_information.key_achievements: Three-time Pro Bowl and All-Pro member, Super Bowl LIX champion with Eagles , only Eagle to post multiple seasons with 1,400+ receiving yards (1,496 in 2022 and 1,456 in 2023) , holds franchise record for most receptions by a WR in Eagles history (106 in 2023)
player_information.performance_goals: Continue elite production as Eagles' top receiver and help team defend Super Bowl championship

team_information.team_strategy: Building offensive attack around dynamic WR duo and championship defense
team_information.team_success: Super Bowl LIX champions, defeating Kansas City Chiefs 40-22

contract_financial_details.performance_metrics: receiving yards, receptions, touchdowns, target share, and playoff performance

agent_information.total_contracts_value: $96 million current contract plus previous $100 million deal

family_information.dependents_count: 2 (son born in 2022, daughter from previous relationship)
family_information.family_priorities: Engaged to long-time girlfriend Kelsey Riley as of May 2025

coaching_management.player_coach_relationship: Close relationship with teammate quarterback Jalen Hurts

ownership_information.championship_success: Super Bowl LIX victory over Kansas City Chiefs
ownership_information.business_priorities: Championship contention and fan engagement through elite offensive play
